credit_advice.advice: Your credit score is considered poor. Focus on making all payments on time and reducing credit utilization. Consider a secured credit card to build credit.
Your credit score is fair. Continue making timely payments and work on reducing existing debt. Avoid applying for new credit.
Your credit score is good. You're likely to qualify for better interest rates. Continue your good credit habits.
Excellent credit score! You qualify for the best rates and terms. Focus on maintaining your excellent credit history.
